product_name: Nathan QuickShot Plus Insulated Handheld Gel/Water Bottle
long_description: The Nathan QuickShot Plus Insulated Handheld gel/water bottle gives you a quick shot of hydration whether training or racing, and keeps fluids cold longer with a reflective, insulated flask. Reflective, double-wall insulated flask with race cap holds 8 fl. oz. of water or energy gel; flask is BPA-free and dishwasher safe. Adjustable hand strap with thumbhole keeps flask in place without having to grip it; expandable zippered pocket holds small essentials. The Nathan QuickShot Plus Insulated Handheld gel/water bottle features 3M reflective trim to enhance your visibility in low light.
short_description: The Nathan QuickShot Plus Insulated Handheld gel/water bottle gives you a quick shot of hydration whether training or racing, and keeps fluids cold longer with a reflective, insulated flask.
